enabled.description: Enable or disable the CARV skill.

onchain_query.title: On-Chain Query
onchain_query.description: allows you to use the nature language to query the on-chain data. Behind the scean, CARV will use LLM model to interpreate the nature language input and convert into the sql query based on the above schemas

token_info_and_price.title: Token Information and Price
token_info_and_price.description: Fetches detailed information and current USD price of a cryptocurrency token from CARV API using its ticker symbol (e.g., 'eth', 'btc'), returning metadata like name, symbol, platform, categories, and contract addresses, useful for understanding its identity, ecosystem, market value, and for obtaining comprehensive token data with live pricing.

fetch_news.title: Fetch News
fetch_news.description: retrieves a list of recent news items, each including a title, URL, and a short description

api_key.title: CARV API Key
api_key.description: API Key for authenticating with the CARV API.

rate_limit_number.title: Rate Limit Number
rate_limit_number.description: Number of requests allowed per time window.

rate_limit_minutes.title: Rate Limit Minutes
rate_limit_minutes.description: Time window in minutes for rate limiting.
